Treatment. 
Proper Clothing. 
     812. If you add clothing, let it be but little, and exercise, if possible, to regain the heat you need. If you positively cannot engage in active exercise, warm yourselves by the fire; but as soon as you are 
                                                                           192
warm, lay off your extra clothing, and remove from the fire.--T., V. II, p. 526.
